General.Name: Roshow Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale of electromagnetic products in China. The company's principal products include composite enameled copper round wires, variable frequency enameled copper round wires, self-adhesive enameled copper round wires, corona enamelled copper round wires, enameled round aluminum wires, and various ultra-fine enameled wires. Its products are used in the electric power, motor, home appliance, automobile, electronics, communication, transportation, power grid, aerospace, and other fields. The company also offers CNC motors, automotive and marine parts, new energy vehicle accessories, and solar power generation related products. In addition, it invests in, designs, constructs, operates, services, and distributes photovoltaic power plants. The company also exports its products to the United States, Brazil, Japan, Italy, Mexico, Slovakia, and other countries. Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Zhuji, China.
